Disease.content:

Paragraph: The main outcome was 30 - day cardiovascular death or myocardial infarction .

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| Disease |
| --- |
| myocardial infarction |

Explanation: The other entity, "30 - day cardiovascular death", is not a clear disease entity as it refers to an event (death) and a system (cardiovascular) rather than a specific disease. Myocardial infarction, on the other hand, is a well-defined disease entity.
